verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

On the first <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H2320><s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shalt thou set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8033>therein<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H5526>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

And thou shalt bring <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> and set in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H853><s%> the things that are to be set in <S%H6187>order<s%> upon it; and thou shalt bring <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> and <S%H5927>light<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>therein.<s%>

And thou shalt set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and hang <S%H5414>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> at the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is therein, and shalt <S%H6942>hallow<s%> it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof: and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> most <S%H6944>holy.<s%> <S%H6944><s%>
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And thou shalt put <S%H3847>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him; that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothe<s%> them with coats: <S%H3801><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> them, <S%H834>as<s%> thou didst <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> that they may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office:<s%> for their <S%H4886>anointing<s%> shall surely <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1961><s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was reared <S%H6965>up.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5414>fastened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> thereof, and put <S%H5414>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

And he spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the ark: <S%H727><s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering,<s%> and <S%H5526>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

And he <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H6187>order<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H5045>southward.<s%>
And he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the veil: <S%H6532><s%>
And he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And he set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>it<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the meat <S%H4503>offering;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> withal.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereat: <S%H4480><s%>

When they <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and when they came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> they <S%H7364>washed;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and set <S%H5414>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Then a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5265>onward<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their journeys: <S%H4550><s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> taken <S%H5927>up,<s%> then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was taken <S%H5927>up.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> on it by <S%H3915>night,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4550>journeys.<s%>
